title: how can i reinstall alpha client
body: i tried to open my league and upgrade it the new client and it did not load anything. after i press launch it closed as usual, and pop out saying to re install alpha client which im haveing trouble on. please help.

replies.body:
This nasty error usually pops up if something went wrong with your upgrade. You should be able to resolve this by temporarily disabling any Firewalls or Antivirus programs, then heading into your installation directory for League (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). From this directory, you'll want to delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file and then launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*) so you can attempt the Client upgrade again.

Let me know if this fixed it! ^.^
Ty, It worked with me too, but i dont know why it didnt downloaded any file at first time, it just looked updated and gave the error about reinstall, when i tryed it with the admin mode, it went fine
